course_title: Family/Emergency Nurse Practitioner III: Traumatic Emergencies
course_description: The course focuses on care of patients with traumatic injuries and exacerbations of chronic diseases in pre-hospital, primary, urgent, and emergency care settings. Emphasis is on injury control and prevention, legal issues, team communication and clinical practice leadership.
prerequisites: NRSG 579 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: 4265, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ONLIN, Meets: W 7a-12:50p, Instructor: Team, Status: Open
